c) h−1 i Inverse (reflection acrossy = x).  ii Vertical line test: fails.
Construct inverse: reflect graph ofy = h(x) across y = x ⇒ relation h−1 Apply
VLT toh−1 : fails (some verticals cut twice) ⇒ Inverse isnot a function
Domain/Range swap: Dom(h−1) =Ran(h), Ran(h−1) =Dom(h) Question 4 (24 points) All
original answers preserved. Reformatted into three readable “summary cards” (no
clipping; full-size math). (a) f(x) = 2x2 −8 4
